ambition.title: MORE THAN A TEAM, A VISION
ambition.text: We are an emerging, passionate organization dedicated to promoting and increasing the visibility of women’s leagues in esports. Our mission is to strengthen women’s representation in gaming and contribute to a more inclusive culture.

become.title: BECOME A PARTNER
become.text: Nevernamed is more than a team — it’s an ambitious project with a clear vision. By becoming our partner, you connect with the passion of the esports community and benefit from a dynamic platform to elevate your brand. Let’s discuss the opportunities and success we can build together.

staffMembers.name: syNip
description: Former professional esports player from the 2000s. Tony played for top French teams.
Since 2007, he has worked with many professional teams and has brought to light over 50 players on the French and international scene.

Since 2018, he has contributed to esports development by designing events and projects for companies and institutions, including the Ministry of Education and the army. He also gives talks and shares his experience through classes in secondary schools on esports and its challenges.
In 2024, he decided to take over the NeverNamed project.

about.valuesText: Nevernamed promotes inclusivity, equality, diversity and learning, as well as raising awareness of esports and digital careers. Made up of passionate professionals, our structure is ready to welcome, support and make talents shine. With a growing women’s team, Nevernamed is committed to promoting and making women’s esports more visible.
about.missionsText: Train, educate, support and perform are our missions. By working with the National Education system in middle and high schools through various workshops on esports, we raise awareness of diversity and inclusion in esports and video game-related careers. We also support players so they can perform at their full potential. NeverNamed blends professionalism and kindness.

1.caption: Our victory on stage last night! So proud!

2.caption: An incredible match and a breathtaking performance.

3.caption: Relive the best moments of the final in our latest video!
